TopicTitle: Transferring Crew to modules under fairings.

Articles.Content: Is there any way to transfer crew to a part that is covered by a fairing.  I can transfer fuel by right clicking on the fairing over the part.  I can even transfer a crew member out of a part by the same way.  But you can't seem to be able to do the left click you need to be able to transfer a crew member in.
Did you try zoom into the fairing?

Just zoom in and angle the camera until it is inside the fairing, you can then click on the part you want to transfer the crew into.

 

Although, this only works if there is enough of a gap between the fairing and the parts contained inside for the camera to be angled into...

Edited February 15, 2016 by Jakalth

Hi,

You can try using the Ship Manifest mod.

Vive_moi
